product_name: CygoLite Metro 400 Front / Rear Bike Light Set
long_description: The bright 400-lumen beam of the Metro offers exceptional night and day visibility, while the Hotshot taillight's adjustable brightness and flash alerts motorists of your presence for safer riding.
short_description: The bright 400-lumen beam of the Metro offers exceptional night and day visibility, while the Hotshot taillight's adjustable brightness and flash alerts motorists of your presence for safer riding.
